title: NO roads will be closed despite May rallies- Police
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Police states that NO roads will be closed today, despite multiple protests and May rallies to be staged in Colombo.
However, the Police Media Unit noted that action will be taken to control any traffic congestions reported.
Police urged the people and motorists to use alternative routes as much as possible during the time protests and rallies take place.
Rulers have not understood gravity of present crisis: Ravi Kumudesh
